General.ეკონომიური_desc: The economical menu is designed for a small budget and includes light snacks.
General.სტანდარტული_desc: Gourmet's standard menu is ideal for all types of events, including corporate parties, family celebrations, or workshops.
General.გასტრონომიული შედევრი_desc: This exclusive menu includes a wide assortment of dishes and beverages, with Gourmet's professional service staff taking care of your comfort. Give your guests a unique gastronomic experience.

DiscountModal.title: Discount
DiscountModal.discount txt: <nowrap><important>5%</important> Discount On The First Order, </nowrap> <nowrap><important>10%</important> On The Third.</nowrap>

Footer.certificate_sub: One of the main factors for fun, joy, and entertainment is a good buffet. Whether it’s a birthday party or a friendly gathering, Gourmet’s service with delicious and diverse dishes will leave an unforgettable impression on you and your friends.
Footer.sub: “Gourmet” is a café and confectionery that has been operating on the Georgian market since 2012, offering customers a full service experience. Since our establishment, we have provided delicious products made from the highest quality ingredients and also offer catering services that your guests won’t forget. Currently, the company owns a large facility on 70 Mirian Mepe Street and hosts guests in various “Gourmet” cafes across Tbilisi.

Catering Modal.title: Choose your desired package
Catering Modal.assistance_title: Would you like Gourmet's staff service?
Catering Modal.assistance_sub: Gourmet's staff service includes a team that will bring dishes and inventory, beautifully set up the buffet, wait until the end of the event, and then clear the tables. If you decline, you will receive your order in packaging boxes, without staff and inventory.

About Us.certificate_sub: Following an audit, Gourmet has been awarded the ISO 22000:2018 international certification after months of thorough inspections by Polish auditing company Grand Cert, which examined buildings, equipment, technological processes, and more, with Gourmet's team meeting all certification requirements, carefully selecting suppliers, and strictly controlling product quality and certifications, all of which guarantees customers that the company's products and services are high-quality and safe for health.
About Us.sub: “Gourmet” is a café and confectionery that has been operating on the Georgian market since 2012, offering customers a full service experience. Since our establishment, we have provided delicious products made from the highest quality ingredients and also offer catering services that your guests won’t forget. Currently, the company owns a large facility on 70 Mirian Mepe Street and hosts guests in various “Gourmet” cafes across Tbilisi.

Custom Catering.title: Consultation
Custom Catering.sub: If you are planning a large-scale event (wedding, corporate party, conference), we recommend contacting a Gourmet manager who will help you determine the scale of catering and select the right dishes. Consultation is free.

Menus.ყავის შესვენება_sub: When there’s little time between meetings to rest and recharge, the coffee break menu plays a crucial role. Gourmet takes this seriously and offers the perfect buffet for your break. Along with aromatic coffee and tea, the menu includes light snacks, pastries, and sweets. With Gourmet’s buffet, your break will be more productive and tasty.
Menus.კორპორაციული ღონისძიება_sub: Making a good impression on colleagues, partners, and guests is important at corporate events. Gourmet offers a professional buffet that reflects your company's style and values. Our service and dishes are designed to make your event elegant, successful, and memorable.
Menus.წვეულება_sub: A good buffet is one of the key elements for fun, joy, and entertainment. Whether it’s a birthday party or a celebration with friends, Gourmet’s service with delicious and diverse dishes will leave an unforgettable impression on you and your friends.

FAQ.ans1: There is no minimum quantity for orders.
FAQ.q2: How far in advance should I place my order?
FAQ.ans2: It is recommended to place your order at least 2 days before the event.
FAQ.ans3: You can pay through the website. You can also request an invoice.
FAQ.q4: Is delivery available in the regions?
FAQ.ans5: Delivery is free within Tbilisi. For regions, the price depends on distance.
FAQ.ans6: Yes, service staff can be hired as an additional service.
FAQ.q7: Is it possible to rent necessary inventory?
FAQ.ans7: Yes, it is possible to rent necessary inventory.

HomePage.title: Gourmet - Delicious Space
HomePage.fourshet_sub: To select your desired buffet, please click the appropriate image.
HomePage.about_us_sub: “Gourmet” is a café and confectionery that has been operating on the Georgian market since 2012, offering customers a full service experience. Since our establishment, we have provided delicious products made from the highest quality ingredients and also offer catering services that your guests won’t forget. Currently, the company owns a large facility on 70 Mirian Mepe Street and hosts guests in various “Gourmet” cafes across Tbilisi.

MenuPage.title: Main Menu
MenuPage.sub: Explore the menu and choose the dishes you like
MenuPage.person range: Please enter the number of guests and receive the ideal menu for you
